titleStmt.title: Cambrensium Caroleia Quibus pr[a]ecepta necessaria ad rempublicam nostram fœliciter administrandum interxuntur [sic]: opera & studio Gulielmi Vaughanni militis.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, William, 1577-1641.
Mason, John, 1586-1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed by William Stansby and Nicholas Okes] impensis Francisci Constable, in Cæmiterio S. Pauli,

notesStmt.note: The map has legend: Newfound Land. described by Captaine Iohn Mason an industrious gent: who spent seuen yeares in the countrey.
A reissue, with a cancel title page printed by Nicholas Okes (STC), of the 1625 edition.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
